Name: Legend Reviver
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Strucchi Rosso Vermouth Star anise infused
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of star anise and lemon zest twist.
RINSE chilled glass with absinthe (swirl around to coat and discard excess) and set to one side.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Garnish with star anise floated on surface.
Review: This slightly rich cocktail makes for a good after-dinner cocktail.
History: Created for Bacardí Legacy 2017 by Wade Cleophas while working on the Norwegian Escape Cruise Ship. (Wade's recipe calls for 7.5ml caramel/cinnamon syrup but we used 5ml cinnamon and 2.5ml caramel.)
Nutrition: One serving of Legend Reviver contains 239 calories
